00012 #include "OryxDriveControllerConfig.h"
00013 #include "ArcDriveController.h"

00031 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00032 {
00033         std::string v_action_topic("velocity_command_topic");   
00034         std::string t_action_topic("translate_command_topic");  
00035         std::string v_drive_topic("drive_velocity_topic");              
00036         std::string s_drive_topic("drive_swerve_topic");                
00037         std::string c_drive_topic("drive_capability_topic");    
00038         std::string ip_v_arc_topic("ip_v_arc_topic");                   
00039         std::string ip_t_arc_topic("ip_t_arc_topic");                   
00040         std::string b_length("base_length");            
00041         std::string b_width("base_width");                      
00042         std::string     can_swerve("swerve_capable");   
00043         double  baseWidth       = .36;                                  
00044         double  baseLength      = .39;                                  
00045         bool    canSwerve       = false;                                
00046 
00047         //Initialize the node
00048         ros::init(argc, argv, "oryx_drive_controller");
00049         //Get a private node handle to parse command line arguments
00050         ros::NodeHandle param_nh("~");
00051         ROS_INFO("Oryx Drive Controller Version: %u.%u.%u", oryx_drive_controller_VERSION_MAJOR, oryx_drive_controller_VERSION_MINOR, oryx_drive_controller_VERSION_BUILD);
00052         //Just a check to make sure the usage was correct
00053         if(argc < 1){
00054                 ROS_INFO("Usage: oryx_drive_controller velocity_command_topic translate_command_topic drive_velocity_topic drive_swerve_topic drive_capability_topic");
00055                 return 1;
00056         }else{
00057                 //Grab the topic parameters, print warnings if using default values
00058                 if(!param_nh.getParam(v_action_topic,   v_action_topic))ROS_WARN("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Velocity Command Action Topic <%s>!", v_action_topic.c_str(), v_action_topic.c_str());
00059                 if(!param_nh.getParam(t_action_topic,   t_action_topic))ROS_WARN("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Translate Command Action Topic <%s>!", t_action_topic.c_str(), t_action_topic.c_str());
00060                 if(!param_nh.getParam(v_drive_topic,    v_drive_topic)) ROS_WARN("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Wheel Velocity Topic <%s>!", v_drive_topic.c_str(), v_drive_topic.c_str());
00061                 if(!param_nh.getParam(s_drive_topic,    s_drive_topic)) ROS_WARN("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Swerve Position Topic <%s>!", s_drive_topic.c_str(), s_drive_topic.c_str());
00062                 if(!param_nh.getParam(c_drive_topic,    c_drive_topic)) ROS_WARN("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Platform Capability Topic <%s>!", c_drive_topic.c_str(), c_drive_topic.c_str());
00063                 if(!param_nh.getParam(b_length,                 baseLength))    ROS_WARN("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Base Length <%f>!", b_length.c_str(), baseLength);
00064                 if(!param_nh.getParam(b_width,                  baseWidth))             ROS_WARN("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Base Length <%f>!", b_width.c_str(), baseWidth);
00065                 if(!param_nh.getParam(can_swerve,               canSwerve))             ROS_WARN("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Value <%s>!", can_swerve.c_str(), ((canSwerve)?"true":"false"));
00066         }
00067 
00068         //Print out recieved topics
00069         ROS_DEBUG("Got Velocity Action Topic Name: <%s>",               v_action_topic.c_str());
00070         ROS_DEBUG("Got Translate Action Topic Name: <%s>",              t_action_topic.c_str());
00071         ROS_DEBUG("Got DriveManager Velocity Topic Name: <%s>", v_drive_topic.c_str());
00072         ROS_DEBUG("Got DriveManager Swerve Topic Name: <%s>",   s_drive_topic.c_str());
00073         ROS_DEBUG("Got DriveManager Capability Topic Name: <%s>",       c_drive_topic.c_str());
00074 
00075         //Spawn the servers. They will act as nodelits to each other, and use intra-process publishing
00076         ROS_INFO("Starting Up Oryx Drive Controller...");
00077         VelocityControlServer v_server(v_action_topic, ip_v_arc_topic);
00078         TranslateControlServer t_server(t_action_topic, ip_t_arc_topic);
00079         ArcDriveController lld_controller(v_drive_topic, s_drive_topic, c_drive_topic, ip_v_arc_topic, ip_t_arc_topic, baseLength, baseWidth);
00080         lld_controller.setCanSwerve(canSwerve);
00081 
00082         /*      ROS_INFO("I'm Testing Stuff Now...");
00083         ROS_INFO("Testing Steer With Velocity = 1m/s, Radius = 5m");
00084         lld_controller.setCanSwerve(false);
00085         lld_controller.drive(1,5);
00086         lld_controller.setCanSwerve(true);
00087         lld_controller.drive(1,5);
00088         ROS_INFO("Testing Translate With X_V=1, Y_V=1");
00089         lld_controller.translate(1,1);*/
00090 
00091         ROS_INFO("Oryx Drive Controller Running!");
00092         ros::spin();
00093         return 0;
00094 }
